title: WTB - REA Lot 255 T210 Series 3 (I need just 3 from this lot)
author: markf31

posts.post_title: WTB - REA Lot 255 T210 Series 3 (I need just 3 from this lot)
posts.post_content:
I was hoping that whomever won lot 255 1910 T210 Old Mill Tobacco "Series 3" Texas League Collection (13) in last night's REA auction would be willing to part with the three cards from this lot that I need.

The cards I need are:
Crable 
McKay 
Morris 

I have about a dozen Series 3 doubles that I would be willing to trade, or I am also willing to purchase. 

Please PM me if you were the successful bidder and are interested in discussing.
